overview:
Mark Heisig is a Vice President and founding Partner with Exervio Management Consulting. He is responsible for Strategic Sales and Delivery for Exervio Management Consulting. In this role, Mr. Heisig manages solution ideation, development and execution. In his consulting practice, Mr. Heisig has worked with an assortment of companies, ranging from some of the largest companies in the world to those with a more regional focus, including: Wal-mart Stores, Inc., Bank of America, GMAC, Hewlett-Packard Co, The Shaw Group, Muzak and Piedmont Natural Gas.

Mr. Heisig has over 18 years of business management consulting experience including strategic planning, operational process assessment/improvement, outsourcing/insourcing and change management. Prior to Exervio Management Consulting, Mark was an Engagement Manager for the Mercer Consulting Group specializing in operations, economics and organizational change management.

Mark holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in Political Science from Indiana University, with a MBA from the University of Indianapolis. He serves on the Board of Directors for the Arts and Science Council in Charlotte and is an active member in the Chamber of Commerce.
